document.full_text: a sultry breeze blowing in from the arabian gulf could not prevent three-times world 200 meters champion allyson felix from setting a season's best of 50.33 in the 400 at the opening diamond league meeting friday.
document.title: felix sets year's best in first diamond league meeting
lines_and_colors: a sultry breeze blowing in from the arabian gulf could not prevent three-times world 200 meters champion allyson felix from setting a season's best of 50.33 in the 400 at the opening diamond league meeting friday.
